member.name: ITfContextOwnerCompositionSink.OnEndComposition
member.summary: Called when a composition is terminated.
member.param: Pointer to an object that represents the composition terminated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerCompositionSink.OnStartComposition
member.summary: Called when a composition is started.
member.param: Pointer to an object that represents the new composition.
Pointer to a BOOL value that receives a value that allows or denies the new composition. Receives a nonzero value to allow the composition or zero to deny the composition.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerCompositionSink.OnUpdateComposition
member.summary: Called when an existing composition is changed.
member.param: Pointer to an object that represents the composition updated.
Pointer to an object that contains the range of text the composition will cover after the composition is updated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerCompositionSink
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerCompositionSink interface is implemented by an application to receive composition-related notifications. When the application calls , the TSF manager queries the object for this interface. If the object supports this interface, the advise sink is installed.
